price: (45) So Allāh protected him from the evils they plotted, and the people of Pharaoh were enveloped by the worst of punishment -
arabic: فَوَقَىٰهُ ٱللَّهُ سَيِّـَٔاتِ مَا مَكَرُواْۖ وَحَاقَ بِـَٔالِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ سُوٓءُ ٱلۡعَذَابِ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: fawaqāhu al-lahu sayyiāti mā makarū waḥāqa biāli fir'ʿawna sūu al-ʿadhābi
